version_description:
We hope you enjoy playing Solitaire. We made some improvements to make this game even better for you.

This update includes:
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

We read all your reviews carefully. Please leave us some feedback why you love this game and what you'd like to improve.

Take a break, it's solitaire time!

A huge update is here!
- Tutorial and new hints
- New game mechanics
- Challenges for previous months – collect more trophies now!
- Classic landscape mode for iPad
- Improved left hand mode
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

Thanks for playing solitaire! We read all your reviews carefully. Please leave us some feedback why you love this game and what features you would like to see next!

- We've added automated hints for you not to miss a tricky move
- Winning deals and random deals are now combined. No confusion - just tap «New deal» and enjoy your favorite Solitaire
- Performance and stability improvements

Thanks for playing solitaire! We read all your reviews carefully. Please leave us some feedback why you love this game and what features you would like to see next!

- New card face has been added and redesign was made of all old card faces and backs
- The Settings window has been improved, now works much faster and has become more informative.
- Added new card movement sounds that feel more realistic while playing.
- Performance and stability improvements

- Enjoy new animations in the pop-ups!
- We have added Haptic Feedback. If you wish, you can turn it off in the settings.
- Performance and stability improvements
